item.title: 微软被指控帮助以色列隐藏巴勒斯坦人的追踪信息
item.description: 一个激进组织提出申诉，指控微软公司违反了欧盟的数据保护法，理由是该公司员工指控该公司帮助以色列从位于欧洲大陆的数据中心移除其广泛监视巴勒斯坦人的证据。【原文：An activist group has filed a complaint accusing Microsoft Corp. of violating the European Union’s data protection law, citing allegations from the company’s employees that it helped remove evidence of Israel’s broad surveillance of Palestinians from data centers located on the continent.】

item.title: 印度称国际货币基金组织（IMF）对数据的 "C "评级是由于基年过旧所致
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）表示，国际货币基金组织对印度国民账户数据的评级低于标准是由于基年过时，并不反映统计数据的质量。【原文：Indian Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said the International Monetary Fund’s below par rating on the country’s national accounts data was due to an outdated base year and not a reflection of the quality of the statistics.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行不会在俄罗斯资产问题上违反欧盟条约
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲中央银行不会违反欧盟规则，为由俄罗斯被冻结资产支持的乌克兰贷款提供支持。【原文：Christine Lagarde said the European Central Bank won’t violate European Union rules to backstop a loan to Ukraine backed by frozen Russian assets.】

item.title: 尽管趋势疲软，加拿大第三季度生产率仍出现反弹
item.description: 加拿大企业的每小时工作产出在第三季度有所上升，在很大程度上扭转了最初因与美国的贸易冲突而对生产率造成的打击。【原文：Canadian firms’ output per hour worked rose in the third quarter, mostly reversing the initial hit to productivity from the trade conflict with the US.】

item.title: 美国服务业活动以九个月来最快速度扩张
item.description: 11 月份，美国服务业活动的扩张速度略有加快，而衡量支付价格的指标则降至七个月来的最低点。【原文：US services activity expanded at a slightly faster pace in November, while a measure of prices paid dropped to a seven-month low.】

item.title: 匈牙利称俄罗斯德鲁日巴石油公司在罢工后继续运营
item.description: 匈牙利说，在遭到乌克兰攻击后，通过关键的德鲁日巴输油管道从俄罗斯流入的石油仍在继续。【原文：Hungary said oil flows from Russia via the key Druzhba oil pipeline continued after it came under attack by Ukraine.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将于下周提出简化银行规则的建议
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲中央银行已经完成了对该地区金融体系监管规则的审查，并计划在未来几天内公布审查结果。【原文：The European Central Bank has concluded its review of regulatory rules governing the region’s financial system and plans to reveal its findings in the coming days, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 在承销了 650 亿美元的交易后，银行家们对 2026 年下了重注
item.description: 长期以来，杠杆融资银行家们一直期待着并购重组的回归。现在他们打赌，明年他们可能终于猜对了。【原文：Leveraged finance bankers have long anticipated the return of M&A. Now they’re betting that next year they might finally be right.】

item.title: 就业数据疲软，股市震荡；微软拖累科技股走低
item.description: 周三早盘，美国股市涨跌不一，因为上月就业人数的下降激起了对美联储下周将再次降息的押注。科技股受微软公司调低人工智能需求预期的报道拖累下跌。【原文：US stocks were mixed early Wednesday as a drop in payrolls last month stoked bets that the Federal Reserve will cut rates again next week. Tech stocks were dragged down by a report that Microsoft Corp. dialed back expectations for artificial-intelligence demand.】

item.title: 人工智能软件需求下降的报告导致微软股价下滑
item.description: 微软公司的股价在《信息》报道该软件制造商降低了让企业客户花钱购买新人工智能产品的预期后下滑。【原文：Microsoft Corp. shares slid after the Information reported that the software maker has lowered expectations for getting business customers to spend money on new artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: 向乔和特蕾西提问
item.description: 嘿，Odd Lots 的读者和听众们。给大家提个醒【原文：Hey Odd Lots readers and listeners. Just a little heads up here.】

item.title: 高盛的莫拉维称牛市和熊市的股票驱动力将发生冲突
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. ）宏观交易员鲍比-莫拉维（Bobby Molavi）将股市在新的一年里的走势比作一场拳击比赛，在这场比赛中，人工智能和刺激措施等看涨因素将对抗估值紧张和信贷压力等看跌因素。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. macro trader Bobby Molavi likens the setup for stocks heading into the new year to a boxing match, where the bullish drivers of AI and stimulus measures confront bearish forces including stretched valuations and credit stress.】

item.title: 没有幽灵，没有游戏：贝芬妮-弗兰克尔旨在重塑在线约会
item.description: The Core 是前 "真实主妇"（Real Housewives）女星贝芬妮-弗兰克尔（Bethenny Frankel）推出的一个新交友平台，用 "不是 "来形容它更为贴切。它不是一个应用程序，不是一个婚介服务，也不是一个基于刷卡的平台。【原文：The Core, a new dating platform from former Real Housewives star Bethenny Frankel, is more easily described by what it isn't. It’s not an app, not a matchmaking service, and not a swipe-based platform.】

item.title: 世界银行称新兴国家债务缺口创 50 年新高
item.description: 世界银行的数据显示，2022 年至 2024 年间，发展中国家外债偿还额与新融资额之间的缺口扩大到 7410 亿美元，是至少 50 年来最大的缺口。【原文：The gap between external debt repayments and new financing in developing countries widened to $741 billion between 2022 and 2024, the largest in at least 50 years, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 波兰再次降息，通胀率降至目标值以下
item.description: 波兰今年第六次降息，此前通胀放缓幅度超过预期，并低于央行的目标。【原文：Poland cut interest rates for the sixth time this year after inflation slowed more than expected and slipped below the central bank’s target.】

item.title: 美国九月份工业生产增长乏力
item.description: 美国 9 月份的工业生产几乎没有增长，受到工厂产出持平的抑制，这与制造业疲软是一致的。【原文：US industrial production barely rose in September, restrained by flat factory output that is consistent with sluggish manufacturing.】

item.title: 为应对规则变更，努比亚银行将申请巴西银行执照
item.description: Nu 控股有限公司表示，在监管机构上周采取行动阻止非银行公司在其品牌中使用 "银行 "一词后，该公司打算在巴西获得银行执照。【原文：Nu Holdings Ltd. said it intends to obtain a banking license in Brazil after regulators moved last week to prevent non-bank companies from using the word “bank” in their brands.】

item.title: TikTok 将在巴西数据中心投资超过 370 亿美元
item.description: ByteDance Ltd. 旗下的 TikTok 将投资超过 2,000 亿雷亚尔（377 亿美元）在巴西建设一个数据中心，这是该公司在拉丁美洲的首个项目。【原文：ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok will invest more than 200 billion reais ($37.7 billion) to build a data center in Brazil, marking its first project in Latin America.】

item.title: 原油疲软，卢布坚挺，俄罗斯石油收入减少三分之一
item.description: 由于原油价格下跌和货币升值，俄罗斯政府 11 月份的石油收入比一年前减少了近三分之一。【原文：The Russian government’s oil proceeds shrank by almost a third in November from a year ago as weaker crude prices and a stronger currency took their toll on revenues.】

item.title: 智利总统卡斯特在紧张辩论中因支出计划遭到抨击
item.description: 智利左派总统候选人珍妮特-哈拉（Jeannette Jara）在两人最激烈的辩论中斥责保守派领跑者提出的公共开支削减计划，称该计划缺乏细节，对社会构成威胁。【原文：Chile’s leftist presidential candidate Jeannette Jara berated the conservative front-runner over his proposed public spending cuts in their most intense debate yet, saying the plans lack details and pose a threat to society.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称未来数月通胀率将保持在 2% 附近
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧元区的通胀率可能会暂时保持在欧洲央行的目标附近，但前景仍然受到关税局势的影响。【原文：Inflation in the euro area will probably remain near the European Central Bank’s goal for the time being, though the outlook is still clouded by the situation around tariffs, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: LSEG 同意通过 ChatGPT 提供财务数据
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）已与 OpenAI 达成协议，允许 ChatGPT 访问其授权的金融新闻和数据。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group Plc has agreed a deal with OpenAI that will give ChatGPT access to its licensed financial news and data.】

item.title: 乌克兰通过 2026 年预算，以获得国际货币基金组织（IMF）新贷款
item.description: 乌克兰议会通过了 2026 年国家预算，这是从国际货币基金组织获得新贷款的关键一步。【原文：Ukraine’s parliament has passed the 2026 state budget, a key step toward securing a new loan from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 连环违约国阿根廷准备重返外国债券市场
item.description: 阿根廷官员正开始为该国重返国际债券市场做准备。据熟悉内情的人士透露，他们希望市场继续向对他们有利的方向发展，这样他们就能在明年年初之前出售债券。【原文：Argentine officials are starting to prepare the country’s return to international bond markets. Their hope is that markets keep moving in their favor so they can sell the bonds by the start of next year, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified because the discussions are private.】

item.title: 随着沙特投资管道的发展，Plus VC 目标在 2026 年完成 40 笔初创企业交易
item.description: 早期投资者 Plus VC 计划在 2026 年为三十多家初创企业提供资金，以期在沙特阿拉伯开展交易，巩固该国作为地区风险投资中心的地位。【原文：Early-stage investor Plus VC plans to fund more than three dozen startups in 2026, with a view toward deals in Saudi Arabia as the country cements its position as a regional venture capital hub.】

item.title: ADP 称美国公司薪资降幅为 2023 年以来最大
item.description: 11 月份，美国公司减少的工资总额创下了 2023 年初以来的最大降幅，这加剧了人们对劳动力市场更加明显疲软的担忧。【原文：US companies shed payrolls in November by the most since early 2023, adding to concerns about a more pronounced weakening in the labor market.】

item.title: 据说大和将持有印度财富管理公司的少数股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大和证券集团公司（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. is set to acquire a minority stake in Ambit Wealth Pvt Ltd., one of India’s largest money managers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非兰特正在失去其剧烈波动的声誉
item.description: 衡量兰特对美元汇率预期波动性的一个指标处于本世纪初以来的最低水平，这表明交易商预计随着今年即将结束，南非货币将不会有太大动荡。【原文：A gauge of expected volatility for the rand versus the dollar is at its lowest level since the turn of the century, suggesting traders expect little upheaval for the South African currency as the year draws to a close.】

item.title: 上月黑海和美国海湾地区石油流量下降
item.description: 上个月，海运石油流量下滑，俄罗斯黑海港口的石油流量急剧下降，美国海湾地区的石油流量也大幅下降。【原文：Seaborne oil flows slumped last month, led by steep declines from Russian ports in the Black Sea and a big drop from the US Gulf.】

item.title: Cerberus 启用前网络空间大使加强防御投注
item.description: Cerberus 资本管理公司（Cerberus Capital Management）任命前美国大使纳撒尼尔-菲克（Nathaniel Fick）担任新设立的股票首席战略官一职，以扩大与国家和经济安全相关的投资。【原文：Cerberus Capital Management appointed Nathaniel Fick, a former US ambassador, to the newly created role of chief strategy officer for equities, as it looks to expand its investments tied to national and economic security.】
